description: Murasaki is the seven year old daughter of Souju and Renjo Kuhouin. She is the one being protected by Shinkuro. At first very stubborn and snobbish, she soon lightens up and trusts Shinkuro. She lives with him for protection against her family that has a rule of keeping her in the Inner Sanctuary of their home at all times and never experiencing the outside world until Benika took her.
name: Kuhouin Murasaki
